sagex.phoenix.weather.worldweather

Class WorldWeatherWeatherSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.weather.worldweather.WorldWeatherWeatherSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWeatherSupport2

    public class WorldWeatherWeatherSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWeatherSupport2
    WorldWeather Online implementation for Phoenix API Key to access our weather forecast is p6y5b5g5haupghedu7p42nbb **** OLD API Key to access our weather forecast is b18c521658003002121007 - not used after 8/31/2013

    www.worldweatheronline.com The base URL for the Free Local Weather API is http://api.worldweatheronline.com/free/v1/weather.ashx **** OLD url http://free.worldweatheronline.com/feed/weather.ashx
